name: Croissant
description: A classic French pastry made with buttery, flaky layers of puff pastry.

name: Baguette
description: A long, thin French bread typically made from wheat flour, water, yeast, and salt.

name: Pain au chocolat
description: A French pastry made of flaky puff pastry with chocolate inside.

name: Eclairs
description: A French pastry made of choux dough filled with cream and topped with chocolate.

name: Napoleon
description: A French pastry made of layers of puff pastry and custard or cream.

name: Cannoli
description: An Italian pastry made of a tube-shaped shell of fried pastry dough filled with sweetened ricotta.

name: Tiramisu
description: An Italian dessert made of ladyfingers dipped in coffee and layered with a whipped mixture of eggs, sugar, and mascarpone cheese.
